column5: Saw this floating around today... dunno if the info is true.. but the picture is awesome none the less!!
Yep I think it's true. There is a post on OFC about it I think... The fish was netted though not angled.
Here is the story from CBC.ca  http://www.cbc.ca/canada/north/story/2009/...sh.html?ref=rss  Also here is the world record from the 60's at http://www.icebirds.com/
I was hoping for something around a buck a beer, but thats a solid fish!!!
well that deffinately looks real........ and old as the hills! lol
Don't believe anything you read on that crappy website...lol.
